partintro.para: MiPlatform is receiving spotlight domestically as a RIA development platform based on X-internet. Thus, Anyframe provides MiPQueryService and MiPController to process data dedicated to MiPlatform when applications are developed based on MiPlatform. mip-query plugin is composed of sample codes to guide basic usage of MiPQueryService and MiPController, the models connected with MiPlatform provided by Anyframe and necessary libraries. Anyframe provides common server modules to help implement basic CRUD functions without coding at all on the server side when applications are developed based on MiPlatform. The mip-query plugin includes sample applications which created MiPlatform-based UI, which are frequently used in the field, for each type using the common server modules.
Install mip-query plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
